name: Tricky Pillars
description:
Tap and hold to charge your jump and make it longer.
Adjust your jump length to reach the next pillar. Be precise, or you will be swimming with the fishes.

Explore the mysterious ruins in this relaxing adventure. Enjoy the sights and the soothing sounds, but don’t get too distracted.
Take your time between jumps, balance your strength to aim, and frontflip. If you’re ambitious, you can even try to perform a valor jump and go far enough to skip a platform!

What will you discover deep within the ruins?
